body: Thanks, @BetaGo. @kotarella1110 you want to take a look at this one?
looks like its due to the `getValues()` type improvement.
worth to mention when I switched to `type` instead of `interface` and it's working.
I will look into this from now on.
Thanks, @kotarella1110 (no rush) I changed to `type` and it's working...
